Classes in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine that implement Provider
 class Actor
           With Workflow, forms the basis for a simple workflow engine.
 

Methods in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine with parameters of type Provider
 void Actor.addProvider(Provider provider)
           Registers a provider for this actor to pull data from
 

Uses of Provider in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.actors
 

Classes in com.brightcove.opensource.workflowengine.actors that implement Provider
 class CSVInputAdapter
           A CSV (Comma Separated Value) input adapter.
 class InputAdapter
           Generic input adapter - for demonstration purposes only.
 class OutputAdapter
           Generic output adapter - writes all records to a file
 class PrintAdapter
           Utility actor that prints each record that passes through it to the workflow logging utility.
 class VideoCloudFindModifiedInputAdapter
           An input adapter that will read from Brightcove Video Cloud Media API using the find_modified_videos method.
 class VideoCloudReEncodeFromExistingSourceAdapter
           Takes each Record provided by downstream providers and uses it to issue a command to re-encode that video from existing source.
 class VideoCloudVideoTouchAdapter
           Takes each Record provided by downstream providers and uses it to "touch" a video in a Video Cloud account.
